Description: Available now! Gorgeously adorned multi level 4 bed 2 bath with gleaming refinished floors, granite kitchen and abundant natural light. Equally sized bedrooms, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, laundry on site and a central location in Brighton Center walkable to the newly developed Western Ave and to the new Boston Landing shopping area. One month broker fee.
